item.title: Kick command T_T
item.dc:creator: @Spyker8 Spyker8
item.description:
@Spyker8 wrote:

People helped me out by giving LOTS of commands, which I am very grateful for.

But NONE of them do anything, I have no errors during compiling, except 2 Notes. But that usually happens and everything is fine except for the ::kick.

I put in a code such as

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights >= 1) { if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase("Spyke")) { sendMessage(" You can't kick Spyke! He's too pro for you!"); } else if(!command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase("Spyke")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You have successfully kicked "+command.substring(5)); LogKick(command.substring(5)); BufferedWriter bw = null

And I save, compile, run server, logon. Then i try to kick somone, but it does NOTHING…I can right click > kick player but it just disconnects them and reconnects them automaticly…

I need it to kick them to login screen.

Anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
